name: Dust Busters Home Cleaning Services
about: Dust Busters is a tech-enabled home cleaning service platform that aims to bring peace of mind to homes across Lesotho with a fresh approach to home cleaning industry. Our mission is to bring technology to domestic cleaning industry and take the pain out of seeking and securing reliable quality cleaner.

name: AfriGrid
about: AfriGrid brings location-based services to areas with no (clearly defined) street addresses.

name: Spreebie
about: Spreebie is a mobile application that facilitates trade by connecting buyers and sellers within the same community.

name: Bonono
about: Bonono Merchants is a clothing / wear stockist inspired deeply by positive approach to timeless trends in fashion and design.BASOTHO FASHION IS ART.

name: Doorstep Deliveries
about: The mall, at the convenience of your doorstep Doorstep Deliveries is Lesotho's most convenient online shopping service. We offer a wide selection of products to order from, a variety of convenient payment methods, and we delivers straight to your doorstep without you lifting a finger.
